Initializer# init(name:matrixFloat2x2:)

iOS 10.0+iPadOS 10.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.12+tvOS 10.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 3.0+

```
init(
    name: String,
    matrixFloat2x2 value: matrix_float2x2
)
```
